page.title: 03Cheriton Fitzpaine School
page.content: EDUCATION The school is the longest thatched{building}in Devon.It has 70 pupils, 3 teachers and 1 part time.The school{bell}was rehung in 1976 & is used everyday. There are many facilities such as colour TV, computer, video & kiln. We take the lunch register in the morning. You can have school dinners, sandwiches or go home. The staff room was the very first school in the village. There is a recorder group which plays every Friday in Assembly. We have services for festivals Harvest & Christmas. The school has Christmas dinner and after it Father Christmas gives gifts. In breaktimes you can play snooker or on the computer, square ball, football etc.At the end of term the leavers are given a book each. This year after renovation{school house}reopened with one class. The swimming pool is here.
